channel.title: Josh Holiday "Kung Fu"
channel.description:
Titled "Kung Fu" using the term for its root meaning witch is to
master an ability or skill
rather that what is commonly know as the fighting art. I felt that this mix shows my interpretation of what it is to dj, and such my...
Kung Fu.

item.title: Mix - WMC 2010- "SOULIS" @ Hotel Clinton (fri night)

Mix from WMC 2010 @ (Friday Night) Hotel Clinton
enjoy

item.title: Play it forward
item.description: I had some good vibes and energy going, being it the holidays and all. I took some time out and got to thinking bout life & the world, the scene man how far we have all come. Well we have that much further to go, and the journey is just starting to get good. So i went into the studio and just laid this mix down, its my message to everyone, we just have to play it forward......Enjoy
item.dc:creator: Josh Holiday
item.itunes:summary: I had some good vibes and energy going, being it the holidays and all. I took some time out and got to thinking bout life & the world, the scene man how far we have all come. Well we have that much further to go, and the journey is just starting to get good. So i went into the studio and just laid this mix down, its my message to everyone, we just have to play it forward......Enjoy
